name: IT 386 Cerebrum Gravity Centrifuge V3 FINAL
name_original: IT 386 Cerebrum Gravity Centrifuge V3 FINAL
description:
This is the final version of the Cerebrum Gravity Centrifuge for IT 386. It features now fully functional animations and gravity manipulation, along with finalized lighting and more compressed textures for web play.

Animations include:

Light shifting from Purple, to yellow, to red as a timer goes on, indicating when gravity is being turned on.

Spinning rings that increase in speed when gravity is turned on, and decelerate when gravity is turned off.

Asteroids and props being flung down when the centrifuge is red and spinning.

Blinking animations for all lights.
